layouts_boxes.layouts_boxes_content:
Newsletter tools stay tuned with your customers!

With this module you can send newsletters to your customers. Make sure you have configured a valid SMTP for sending mail. Mailer module suggested.

It's very easy to create a newsletter campaign:

  • 1. Create a list
  • 2. Insert or import contacts
  • 3. Create and send a beautiful mail
apilib->view('newsletters_campaign', $value_id); if ($campaign['newsletters_campaign_type'] == 1): ?>

actions.grids_actions_html: array with all record data * $this => native CodeIgniter instance (usefull to execute queries, get input vars, session data, etc...) * * Placeholders * {value_id} => current record id * {base_url} => baseurl (ends with "/") * * Example 1: * text * * Example 2: * debug($row_data); //This will generate a print_r/var_dump of the record (usefull when you want to detect all keys available in $row_data * echo($this->auth->get('users_id')); //Print id of the current logged user */ if ($row_data['newsletters_campaign_type'] == 1) { $url = "{base_url}/customers-newsletters/main/send_newsletters_email/{value_id}"; } else if ($row_data['newsletters_campaign_type'] == 2) { $url = "{base_url}/customers-newsletters/main/send_newsletters_sms/{value_id}"; } else if ($row_data['newsletters_campaign_type'] == 3) { $url = ""; } ?>
